channel.title: Javascript Function (Correct Board?)
channel.description:
is there a javascript function to breakout of a frames page?
I have this:
[code] function breakout_of_frame() {if (top.location != location) {top.location.href = document.location.href ;}} [/code]
I was wondering, if instead of it breaking out of the frame page that the link is [i]NOT[/i] in, if it can close the one that it [i]IS[/i] in.
